# this example gives a top hat window function W(k) =  3 (kRcos(kR) - sin(kR))/(kR)^3;  (no need to normalize. COOP does automatic normalization). R = 10^3 h^{-1} Mpc
# k in h Mpc^{-1} ,      W(k) (not squared!)
